title: Power loom use shall be restricted up to maximum permissible floor area of 250 sq
clause_text: Power loom use shall be restricted up to maximum permissible floor area of 250 sq.m. with maximum 20 H.P. and 20 labourers; Total FSI permissible shall be as that of residential zone;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Power loom use shall be restricted up to maximum permissible floor area of 250 sq.m. with maximum 20 H.P. and 20 labourers;
